tweets.text:
The ‘toe’ part of a riverbank is the bit most affected by flowing water and, therefore, erosion.

We’re in Wainfleet installing anti-erosion measures to protect this most vulnerable part of the Steeping River.

It’s all part of efforts by Steeping partners to reduce flood risk. https://t.co/oM6FseHnM3

Are you aware of the #NWRFCC? and their role as one of 12 #RFCCs protecting #communities from #flooding and #coastalerosion in #England ??https://t.co/f7LUeXFUBU

@TheFloodHub @EnvAgencyNW @unitedutilities #Cheshire #Cumbria #Merseyside #Lancashire #GreaterManchester #flood https://t.co/VcPzRSEDDS

They narrate what it has meant to live with the mining company Shougang Hierro Perú S.A.A, owned by the Chinese state company Shougang Corporation, since 1992, the year in which a Chinese capital mining company first settled in the country.

@LDNWaterkeeper It's happened again today! This time with additional extra black oil. Phoned in @EnvAgency again. It's coming from a private outfall so, given the increasing regularity, is becoming routine practice. It's heart breaking!!
@NigelWitham Thanks. Regardless of what it says, there's no policing of it here in NI & it is common practice. Probably doesn't apply here.

@37squadron @spainsestate @WoodhallEstate @HMWTBadger @EssexWildlife @suffolkwildlife @EnvAgencyAnglia You're so lucky to have them come out whilst there is still light. Our birds don't come out until well after sunset, about 40 to 50 minutes after.

urls.title: Plans submitted for a new ‘aquagreen’ to reduce flooding in east Hull
urls.description: Plans to create a large ‘aquagreen’ to reduce flood risk to homes and businesses near Bransholme in east Hull have been submitted for planning approval.

urls.title: Esh Construction completes £7.4m major flood alleviation scheme in Cottingham - Esh Group
urls.description: The scheme was essential to protect 4,000 properties from future flood risk.

tweets.text:
Eight cascading water attenuation lagoons have been constructed in a vital flood scheme in #Cottingham, with a combined capacity to store over 300,000 cubic metres of water! 

In partnership with @East_Riding @Pell_Frischmann @EnvAgency @YORcivil @YORhub 

https://t.co/NZwgo4S3ax
